page.title: 02BURWELL AND SWAFFHAM SCHOOLS
page.content: In{Swaffham Priory School}they teach ages 4-11.The eleven year olds will be going to{Bottisham Village College next year.After school hours they have several activities such as chess, badminton and games.There also was a girl who played short tennis at Wimbledon.The most popular lesson is Peak maths and the most liked teacher is the Thursday morning swimming teacher. At{Ness Road First School in Burwell} they teach 4-9year olds.Next September they will all be going to the {new Primary School at the Village {College}which will be for 4-11 year olds. At the moment they have a little swimming pool which the children use in the summer . The head_master used to be a builder for 25 years before his 15 years of teaching.
